abstract: Wells Fargo, which has agreed to buy Wachovia, asked a federal court to void Citigroup‘s earlier agreement to buy parts of the big North Carolina lender.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo, which has agreed to buy Wachovia, asked a federal court to void Citigroup‘s earlier agreement to buy parts of the big North Carolina lender.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Asks Court to Void Citi’s Wachovia Deal

abstract: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street announced earnings that beat expectations, but their shares fell on fears of a drawn-out erosion of the economy.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street announced earnings that beat expectations, but their shares fell on fears of a drawn-out erosion of the economy.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase, Wells Fargo, and State Street have weathered these bad times better than most banks. But things are about to get worse.

headline.main: Banks Brace for Slump as Economy Weakens
headline.print_headline: Banks Brace for Slump As Economy Weakens

abstract: Wells Fargo, whose planned purchase of Wachovia will create the largest U.S. retail branch banking network, said on Wednesday third-quarter profit fell 25 percent, hurt by higher credit losses and investment write-downs.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo, whose planned purchase of Wachovia will create the largest U.S. retail branch banking network, said on Wednesday third-quarter profit fell 25 percent, hurt by higher credit losses and investment write-downs.
